emuInput.TitMainTitle: Herb Wright and Frances Nunn standing behind rope in Philip Morris booth in Syria Mosque for 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...15. Herb Wright, assistant sales manager of the Philip Morris Company, strikes a pose with lovely Frances Nunn in the Philip Morris booth...Harris Photos"
